news_header: Major oil companies are expected to report better-than-anticipated fourth-quarter earnings due to stable oil prices and strong commodity prices, with Permian Resources, TC Energy, and Antero Midstream highlighted as key players.
news_original_title: 3 Energy Stocks Positioned to Surpass Earnings Estimates in Q4
news_text: As the fourth-quarter earnings season begins, major oil companies are yet to report results, but expectations are high due to a favorable pricing environment. Stable oil prices around $70 per barrel have provided a solid foundation for exploration and production activities, benefiting upstream, midstream, and downstream sectors. Permian Resources, TC Energy, and Antero Midstream are positioned for strong performance, with strategies focused on high-return investments and production efficiency. Investors are encouraged to use a combination of Earnings ESP and Zacks Rank to identify stocks likely to outperform.
